projects.title: Student Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive web-based system to manage student records, attendance, grades, and academic progress. Features include student registration, course management, and report generation.

projects.title: Weather Prediction using Machine Learning
projects.description: Advanced weather forecasting system using machine learning algorithms to predict weather patterns based on historical data and real-time meteorological information.

projects.title: IoT Home Automation System
projects.description: Smart home automation system using Arduino and various sensors to control lights, temperature, security systems, and appliances remotely via mobile app.

projects.title: E-commerce Mobile Application
projects.description: Full-featured mobile e-commerce app with product catalog, shopping cart, payment integration, order tracking, and user reviews system.

projects.title: Blockchain-based Voting System
projects.description: Secure and transparent voting system using blockchain technology to ensure vote integrity, prevent fraud, and maintain voter anonymity.

projects.title: AI Chatbot for Customer Support
projects.description: Intelligent chatbot using natural language processing to provide automated customer support, handle queries, and escalate complex issues to human agents.

projects.title: Hospital Management System
projects.description: Complete hospital management solution with patient records, appointment scheduling, inventory management, billing, and staff management modules.

projects.title: Image Recognition for Medical Diagnosis
projects.description: Deep learning system for medical image analysis to assist doctors in diagnosing diseases from X-rays, MRIs, and CT scans with high accuracy.

projects.title: Smart Parking System
projects.description: IoT-based parking management system that uses sensors to detect available parking spots and guides drivers to empty spaces via mobile app.

projects.title: Social Media Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time analytics dashboard for social media platforms that tracks engagement, sentiment analysis, and provides insights for marketing campaigns.

projects.title: Cryptocurrency Portfolio Tracker
projects.description: Mobile app to track cryptocurrency investments, monitor market prices, set alerts, and generate portfolio performance reports.

projects.title: Face Recognition Attendance System
projects.description: Automated attendance system using face recognition technology to mark attendance without manual intervention.
